channel.title: CVE Feed for flector -- Easy Textillate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for flector -- Easy Textillate

item.title: CVE-2024-2303|2024-08-02T16:12:01.543Z -- flector -- easy%20textillate
item.description: The Easy Textillate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'textillate' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.01 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2303|2024-08-01T19:11:52.496Z -- flector -- easy%20textillate

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-32526|2024-04-17T09:48:05.714Z -- flector -- easy%20textillate
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Flector Easy Textillate allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Textillate: from n/a through 2.02.
